title: 8V Exchange
author: 8V Exchange
content: Join More Than 50,000 People Trading On8V GLOBAL CRYPTO EXCHANGEWEBSITE >> APP INSTALL >> Website Features: Spot Trading The spot trading feature allows you to buy or sell over 160+ different cryptocurrencies paired with USDT, right at their current market price. This includes more than 100 coins related to the metaverse, giving you a wide range of options to choose from. Our platform is designed to be easy to use, whether you're new to trading or have been doing it for years. We provide real-time market data to help you make your trading decisions. Futures Trading We offer an extensive range of futures trading options, including Coin-Margined Futures (Coin-M) and USDT-Margined Futures (USDT-M). Coin-Margined Futures, or Coin-M, are futures contracts that use the cryptocurrency itself as collateral. This means if you're trading Bitcoin futures, your profits and losses are calculated and settled in Bitcoin. On the other hand, USDT-Margined Futures, or USDT-M, are futures contracts that use USDT (Tether), a stablecoin pegged to the US dollar, as collateral. This allows you to speculate on the future price of a cryptocurrency without needing to hold the actual cryptocurrency. With these futures trading options, you can take advantage of price movements, hedge your positions, and potentially enhance your returns. Staking 8V Global provides a variety of staking options that allow you to earn returns on your cryptocurrency holdings. With zero risk, high returns, and flexible terms, our staking options are designed to meet your investment needs. Our offerings include regular staking options for USDT and USDC, which are available anytime and offer a fixed 2% APR with terms ranging from 7 to 90 days. For those seeking higher returns, we offer High-Yield Limited Quantitative-USDT staking options with an 8% fixed APR for 90 days and a 6% fixed APR for 30 days, both requiring a minimum deposit of 1000 USDT. We also offer flexible staking options for USDT, BTC, and ETH. The USDT Flexible option offers a 1.5% fixed APR with a minimum deposit of 1000 USDT, while the BTC Flexible and ETH Flexible options offer a 0.7% and 0.5% fixed APR respectively, with minimum deposits of 0.05 BTC and 8 ETH. Lastly, our Quantitative One option offers the highest historical annualization at 22.3%.Mobile App FeaturesAll Web Features PLUS: Margin Trading We provide a powerful margin trading feature that allows you to leverage your trades up to 300 times. This means you can trade with more capital than you have in your account, giving you the opportunity to maximize your potential profits.Our platform is designed to be user-friendly and efficient, providing you with the necessary tools to manage your trades effectively. Crypto Loans 8V Global offers a Crypto Loans feature, providing a convenient way for you to secure funds without having to sell your cryptocurrencies. This feature allows you to use your crypto assets as collateral to borrow funds, providing you with the liquidity you need while still maintaining your position in the crypto market. Our platform ensures a smooth and efficient loan process, offering competitive interest rates and flexible repayment terms. Whether you need funds for personal use, business expansion, or further investment, our Crypto Loans feature provides a quick and easy solution. OTC Trading This feature is particularly useful for large volume trades, as it allows you to bypass the public order books, reducing the potential impact on the market price. Our OTC trading platform ensures privacy and discretion, with trades being conducted directly between parties. It offers competitive pricing and a seamless trading experience, making it an ideal choice for high-volume traders. HK/US Stocks Trading This new feature allows you to diversify your investment portfolio by trading in some of the world's largest and most active stock markets. Whether you're interested in blue-chip companies, tech giants, or emerging industries, our platform provides access to a wide range of stocks. With real-time market data, advanced trading tools, and a user-friendly interface, you can navigate the stock market with ease. Now, not only can you trade cryptocurrencies on the go, but you can also participate in the global equity market. With 8V Global's HK/US Stocks trading feature, you can broaden your investment opportunities and manage your portfolio directly from your mobile device. Auto-Invest With Auto-Invest, you can set your own investment schedule and amount, and our platform will automatically execute the purchases for you. This not only saves you time but also helps you implement a disciplined investment strategy, such as dollar-cost averaging. Whether you're a seasoned investor or a beginner, Auto-Invest is a convenient tool that can help you navigate the crypto market with ease.  Mining 8V Global introduces a unique "Mining" feature on our platform. This feature, while not traditional mining, allows you to stake your cryptocurrencies and earn returns, similar to the staking process. By participating in this form of "Mining", you're contributing to the blockchain network while earning rewards. It's a simple and effective way to earn passive income from your cryptocurrency holdings. Buy Crypto with Credit Card 8V Global makes entering the crypto market easier than ever with our "Buy Crypto with Credit Card" feature. This feature allows you to purchase cryptocurrencies directly using your credit card, providing a quick and convenient way to start your crypto journey. Whether you're a seasoned trader looking to quickly increase your holdings, or a beginner making your first purchase, this feature simplifies the process. With just a few clicks, you can buy your chosen cryptocurrency and it will be directly deposited into your 8V Global account.WEBSITE APP TWITTER FACEBOOK TELEGRAM INSTAGRAM MEDIUM DISCORD REDDIT æ—¥æœ¬èªží•œêµ­ì¸FranÃ§aisEspaÃ±olPyccÐºÐ¸Ð¹DeutschPortuguÃªsà¤¹à¤¿à¤‚à¤¦à¥€Tiáº¿ng Viá»‡tPilipinoà¸ à¸²à¸©à¸²à¹„à¸—à¸¢TÃ¼rkItalianoIndonesiaØ¹Ø±Ø¨ÙŠä¸­æ–‡ç®€ä½“ä¸­æ–‡ç¹é«”MarketsMetaverseRegisterLoginForgotPasswordEarnAbout   usBTC/USDT[ usBTC/USDT  [/url[url=https://8v.com/exchange/dodo_usdt/zh_CN]DODO/USDTWOO/USDTXMR/USDTDASH/USDTYFI/USDTLUNA/USDTCRV/USDT1INCH/USDTBUSD/USDTUSDC/USDTALICE/USDTMASK/USDTMBOX/USDTAVAX/USDTDYDX/USDTADA/USDTARB/USDTID/USDTSUI/USDTAPT/USDTTON/USDTOG/USDTVGX/USDTRDNT/USDTCTSI/USDTOP/USDTHBAR/USDTSTX/USDTALGO/USDT
